author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NanoViricides Says It Is Financially Stable
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - NanoViricides Inc:
* NANOVIRICIDES PROVIDES UPDATE, SAYS COMPANY IS STABLE AND IS MOVING STEADILY TOWARDS CLINICAL TRIALS
* NANOVIRICIDES SAYS “IS FINANCIALLY STABLE”, AND BELIEVES THAT IT HAS SUFFICIENT FINANCING AVAILABLE FOR MORE THAN ONE YEAR OF OPERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
